intro: This document serves as a comprehensive Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Priority Area Monitoring product, Riparian Zones (RZ). It provides a detailed description of all LC/LU classes within riparian areas, encompassing their geographical characteristics, applicable input datasets, and relevant methods for their interpretation. The document is essential for ensuring consistent and accurate mapping of riparian zones across the EEA-38 + UK, supporting environmental monitoring and policy initiatives.
